title: Antioch Police Investigate Shooting Death Of Teen
content:
Officers with the Antioch Police Department responded Wednesday at 9:14 p.m. to the area of Mark Twain Drive and Ebbetts Way on a report of shots heard in the area.
While officers were responding, a report came in a person had been shot on a nearby trail.
Officers located a 17-year-old from Antioch suffering from gunshot wounds, police said.
The victim was transported to the hospital, where he died.
Police are investigating the homicide.
